sections.title: Building Better Spending Habits
sections.subtitle: Simple systems to make good choices automatic

sections.title: Why Habits Beat Willpower
sections.content: Habits beat willpower. Small guardrails placed near spending triggers reduce friction and save money without feeling deprived.

sections.title: Two-Minute Rule
sections.content: If a purchase takes less than two minutes of thought, add a 24-hour cooling-off step.

points.title: Default Settings
points.description: Turn off one-click checkout and save-only cards to create pause.

points.title: Spending Triggers
points.description: Note time, mood, and apps that lead to impulse buys.

points.title: Budget Anchors
points.description: Name 2-3 priorities (debt, emergency fund) to compare each purchase against.

sections.title: Try This Now
steps: Disable one-click on Amazon and app stores
Create a 24-hour list note on your phone

sections.title: Pro Tip
sections.content: Keep a shared wishlist; review weekly instead of buying instantly.
